description: Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition no.2 (approved plans), no.3 (Material) and Condition 4 (Tree Plan ) in relation to planning permission reference 240259HH dated 14/03/2024 for: Single storey detached garden outbuilding for use as garage/gym/storage following demolition of existing garage. Alterations seek to alter the siting of the proposed replacement garage and reduction in height and depth of the outbuilding and alteration to materials (anthracite grey cladding) and alteration to tree plan in relation to amended siting
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of 14/03/2024, when permission was granted.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): Proposed Roof Plan and Building Layout drawing no.002 Rev C, Proposed East Elevation drawing no.005 Rev C, Proposed South Elevation drawing no.006 Rev C,  Proposed West Elevation drawing no.007 Rev C, Proposed North Elevation drawing no.008 Rev C and Tree Plan drawing no.012 Rev C rec. 7/11/2024
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.19) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The extended outbuilding shall only be used for domestic purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwelling and not for any separate residential, industrial, commercial or business use. No kitchen or cooking facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties, in accordance with the National Planning Policy Framework 2023 - section 12, Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1 (g) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies D1, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the submitted Tree Plan drawing number 012 Rev C rec. 19/11/2024.

Reason: To ensure appropriate tree protection in the interests of protecting the visual amenity of the area, contributing to the quality and character of London's environment, air quality and adapting to and mitigating climate change in accordance with National Planning Policy and Framework 2023 (Updated) - section 15, policies G5 and G7 of the London Plan, policy 5.10 of Ealing's Development Management DPD, Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.19) policy G5 and Ealing's SPG 9 - Trees and Development Guidelines
